description: Designed specifically for anglers, this lightweight, Relaxed Fit, nylon shirt dries fast, keeps you cool, and protects against UV rays. Mesh-lined back vents let in and out a cooling breeze—perfect in hot, humid weather. Tabs secure rolled-up sleeves, a rod holder helps keep your hands free, and four chest pockets store your small essentials.
name: Columbia Sportswear Bahama II LS Shirt - Mens
